FuncDef: This command configures a rate adjustment for the scheduler. Therate-adjustmentcommand should be used when the rate returned by the DSLAM is calculated with different encapsulation than the 7450 ESS or 7750 SR. The node will adjust the rate by the percent specified as:

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a rate adjustment for the scheduler. Values-1 to 200. ParamDefault: Default- 100
